Both "Four Christmases" and "Be Kind Rewind" might be enjoyable for you, given your interest in farce and intriguing plots!

"Four Christmases" is a lighthearted comedy about a couple trying to visit all four of their divorced parents on Christmas, starring Vince Vaughn and Reese Witherspoon. On the other hand, "Be Kind Rewind" is a quirky and humorous film where two bumbling store clerks re-shoot every film in their video rental store with zero budget, featuring Jack Black and Mos Def. Enjoy the movies!

Out of the given options, I'd highly recommend "Man on Wire" for you. This film tells the story of Philippe Petit's daring tightrope walk between the Twin Towers in New York City, a truly captivating and inspiring tale. It stars Jean-Louis Blondeau, Paul McGill, and Philippe Petit himself, who give mesmerizing performances that bring the story to life.

If you're interested in an action-packed thriller with a strong lead performance by Denzel Washington, you might also enjoy "The Equalizer." In this film, Washington plays an enigmatic vigilante seeking justice for those in need.
